title: The NABC's of basketball: individual offense
brief_description: Gene Bartow, Coach of the Year in 1973, relates the drills that his players use to develop individual offensive skills. Shows drills for guards, forwards and centres, as well as exercises for two-man situations.
description: Gene Bartow, Coach of the Year in 1973, relates the drills that his players use to develop individual offensive skills. Shows drills for guards, forwards and centres, as well as exercises for two-man situations.
